Lyric:
[00:08.450]All I know is there's something about ya'
[00:10.200]Got me feeling like I can't be without ya'

[00:16.140]Ain't no words to describe you baby
[00:18.050]All I know is that you take me high

[00:21.920]Cause I can't get you outta my mind
[00:23.940]Think of ya' when I am going to bed
[00:25.660]When I wake up, think of you again
[00:27.890]You are my homie, lover, and friend
[00:29.860]Exactly why, you light me up inside
[00:33.170]Like the 4th of July
[00:35.170]Whenever you're around, I always seem to smile
[00:39.260]And people ask me how, well you're the reason why
